items.title: CISA and Partners Providing Real-Time Incident Response to Cyber Attack on State of Nevada
items.summary: CISA and its public and private sector partners are working closely with officials in Nevada as they respond to an August 24th cyber-attack targeting the state and impacting essential services.
red_flags: Unsolicited contact asking for personal/financial info
Urgent language or threats (account locked, legal action)
Links or attachments from unknown senders
what_to_do: Do not click links—go directly to the official website/app
Never share passwords, 2FA codes, or full SSN
Report to the FTC at reportfraud.ftc.gov and your bank
